infotexts.afflictiondescription.pressure4000: Protects you against water pressure equivalent to a depth of 4000 meters when fully pressurized.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.pressure5750: Protects you against water pressure equivalent to a depth of 5700 meters when fully pressurized.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.pressure6000: Protects you against water pressure equivalent to a depth of 6000 meters when fully pressurized.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.pressure6200: Protects you against water pressure equivalent to a depth of 6200 meters when fully pressurized.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.pressure6650: Protects you against water pressure equivalent to a depth of 6600 meters when fully pressurized.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.pressure7500: Protects you against water pressure equivalent to a depth of 7500 meters when fully pressurized.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.pressure8000: Protects you against water pressure equivalent to a depth of 8000 meters when fully pressurized.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.pressure10000: Protects you against water pressure equivalent to a depth of 10000 meters when fully pressurized.
infotexts.entitydescription.clowndivingsuit1: Allows the wearer to gain clown power when worn with any clown related helmet or mask.
infotexts.entitydescription.clowndivingsuit2: Allows the wearer to gain clown power when worn with any clown related helmet or mask.
infotexts.entitydescription.clowndivingsuit3: Allows the wearer to gain clown power when worn with any clown related helmet or mask.
infotexts.entitydescription.clowndivingsuithelmet: Allows the wearer to gain clown power when worn with any clown related suit.
infotexts.entitydescription.suitseal: A seal required to seal off a diving suit with a diving helmet.
infotexts.entitydescription.suitvalveswitch: A device capable of switching the state of someone's diving suit pressure valve. Useful to pressurize or depressurize an unconcious person.
